headline.main: November 18-24; Killed for Covering the War

lead_paragraph: Four foreign journalists in Afghanistan were murdered by armed gunmen on the highway halfway between Jalalabad and Kabul. A witness said the gunmen shouted: ''The Taliban are still here!''
snippet: Four foreign journalists in Afghanistan were murdered by armed gunmen on the highway halfway between Jalalabad and Kabul. A witness said the gunmen shouted: ''The Taliban are still here!''...
